nodes.text: Talus Ironworks was an arms manufacturer based in the Corellia system that manufactured the XL-2 "Flashfire" blaster pistol and the ASP-9 "Vrelt" autopistol. The XL-2 was accidentally created by Talus Ironworks engineers when they performed a test fire using a prototype with a faulty focusing aperture. The fault produced a bright flash of the light when the weapon fired. Through continued study, the Talus Ironworks engineers eventually perfected the XL-2. Talus Ironworks shared its name with Talus, a planet of the Corellia system.

Talus Ironworks was first mentioned in the 2019 canon Fantasy Flight Games roleplaying game sourcebook Gadgets and Gear. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, Talus Ironworks was first mentioned in Suns of Fortune, a 2014 Fantasy Flight Games sourcebook.
